mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW ( NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO , FHS_ID_NO , FARM_AMNNO , SOG_NA_TRPL_C , VHC_SHRT_C , RC_DT , SRA_INDV_AMNNO , SRA_SRS_DSC , SEL_STS_DSC , BRCL_ISP_DT , LWPR_CHG_NT , VACN_DT , PPGCOW_FEE_DSC , PRNY_JUG_YN , NCSS_JUG_YN , TRPCS_PY_YN , SRA_TRPCS , SRA_FED_SPY_AM , AFISM_MOD_DT , PRNY_MTCN , RMHN_YN , SRA_PDMNM , SRA_PD_RGNNM , RMK_CNTN , AUC_PRG_SQ , TMS_YN , DEL_YN , AUC_YN , MOD_KPN_NO , DDL_QCN , FEE_CHK_YN , SELFEE_CHK_YN , FEE_CHK_YN_FEE , SELFEE_CHK_YN_FEE , BLOOD_AM , DNA_YN , DNA_YN_CHK , FED_SPY_YN , AMNNO , MODL_NO , DNA_SAMPLED_YN , FSRG_DTM , FSRGMN_ENO , LSCHG_DTM , LS_CMENO ) SELECT A.NA_BZPLC , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC , A.AUC_DT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.AUC_RECV_DT ASC, A.AUC_RECV_NO ASC) AS OSLP_NO , 1 AS LED_SQNO , A.FHS_ID_NO , A.FARM_AMNNO , B.NA_TRPL_C , A.VHC_SHRT_C , A.AUC_RECV_DT , A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO , '01' AS SRA_SRS_DSC , '11' AS SEL_STS_DSC , A.BRCL_ISP_DT , 0 AS LWPR_CHG_NT , A.VACN_DT , A.PPGCOW_FEE_DSC , A.PRNY_JUG_YN , A.NCSS_JUG_YN , A.TRPCS_PY_YN , A.SRA_TRPCS , A.SRA_FED_SPY_AM , A.AFISM_MOD_DT , A.PRNY_MTCN , A.DEBD_CANCEL_YN , B.FTSNM , B.DONGUP , A.RMK_CNTN , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.AUC_RECV_DT ASC, A.AUC_RECV_NO ASC) AS AUC_PRG_SQ , '0' AS TMS_YN , '0' AS DEL_YN , '0' AS DEL_YN , A.MOD_KPN_NO , '0' AS DDL_QCN , '0' AS FEE_CHK_YN , '0' AS SELFEE_CHK_YN , 0 AS FEE_CHK_YN_FEE , 0 AS SELFEE_CHK_YN_FEE , 0 AS BLOOD_AM , A.DNA_JUG_RESULT , A.DNA_YN_CHK , B.SRA_FED_SPY_YN , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.AUC_RECV_DT ASC, A.AUC_RECV_NO ASC) AS AUC_PRG_SQ , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.AUC_RECV_DT ASC, A.AUC_RECV_NO ASC) AS AUC_PRG_SQ , A.DNA_SAMPLED_YN , SYSDATE , #{ss_userid} , SYSDATE , #{ss_userid} FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_COW_RECV A INNER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS B ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.FHS_ID_NO = B.FHS_ID_NO AND A.FARM_AMNNO = B.FARM_AMNNO) WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt_st} AND A.RECV_CAN_YN = '0'
